leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 结构生物-功能/位点/相互作用预测生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 表征→功能/位点→相互作用→解释→benchmark
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 模型库 + 数据集 + 评测

queries: [WEB] deep learning protein function datasets github

tools.name: ProteinInvBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for protein design on diverse tasks, models, and metrics
tools.detailed_description: The official implementation of the NeurIPS'23 paper ProteinInvBench. It serves as a comprehensive benchmark for evaluating protein design methods across various tasks and metrics.

tools.name: CASP15-Benchmarking
tools.one_line_profile: Performance benchmarking of CASP15 protein structure prediction methods
tools.detailed_description: A repository dedicated to the performance benchmarking of state-of-the-art protein structure prediction methods evaluated during the CASP15 experiment.

tools.name: PSBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for estimating accuracy of protein complex structural models
tools.detailed_description: A large and comprehensive benchmark dataset and toolkit for estimating the accuracy of protein complex structural models, aiding in the evaluation of quality assessment methods.

tools.name: PoseBench
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive benchmarking of protein-ligand structure prediction methods
tools.detailed_description: An AI4Science benchmark (ICML 2024) for evaluating protein-ligand structure prediction (docking) methods, covering diverse targets and ligands.

tools.name: SURFY2
tools.one_line_profile: Classifier for predicting human transmembrane protein surface localization
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning classifier (meta-ensemble learning) to predict whether a human transmembrane protein is located at the cell surface or intracellular membranes based on sequence characteristics.

tools.name: protein-se3
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking SE3-based generative models for protein structure design
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking repository for evaluating SE3-based generative models specifically for protein structure design tasks, utilizing a PyTorch Lightning backend.

tools.name: BeProf
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for deep learning-based protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive computational benchmark designed to evaluate deep learning-based approaches for protein function prediction.

tools.name: PoseX
tools.one_line_profile: A Molecular Docking Benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite specifically designed for evaluating molecular docking algorithms and models.

tools.name: CBGBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for Protein-Molecule Complex Binding Graph
tools.detailed_description: Official code repository for 'CBGBench: Fill in the Blank of Protein-Molecule Complex Binding Graph', providing a benchmark for evaluating binding graph models.

tools.name: NetSurfP-3.0
tools.one_line_profile: Protein secondary structure and relative solvent accessibility prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein secondary structure and relative solvent accessibility using deep learning methods.

tools.name: FLAb
tools.one_line_profile: Fitness landscapes for antibodies analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for analyzing fitness landscapes of antibodies, useful for studying antibody evolution and affinity maturation.

tools.name: otter-knowledge
tools.one_line_profile: Knowledge-enhanced learned representation for drug target binding
tools.detailed_description: A tool that enriches protein sequence and SMILES drug databases with a large Knowledge Graph to improve drug target binding affinity prediction.

tools.name: Scaffold-Lab
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for protein backbone generative models
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark repository for evaluating the performance of multiple protein backbone generative models.

tools.name: StructTokenBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for protein structure tokenization methods
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark suite designed for the comprehensive evaluation of various protein structure tokenization methods used in machine learning models.

tools.name: B4PPI
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking Pipeline for Prediction of Protein-Protein Interactions
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for benchmarking various methods for the prediction of Protein-Protein Interactions (PPI).

tools.name: MolScore
tools.one_line_profile: Automated scoring function for de novo molecular design
tools.detailed_description: An automated scoring function to facilitate and standardize the evaluation of goal-directed generative models for de novo molecular design, supporting various objective functions.

tools.name: ProteinGym
tools.one_line_profile: Extensive benchmarks for protein fitness prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive collection of Deep Mutational Scanning (DMS) assays and clinical variants serving as benchmarks for evaluating protein fitness prediction models.

tools.name: SkillMetricsToolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Matlab toolbox for evaluating model prediction skill
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Matlab functions for calculating the skill of model predictions against observations, including Taylor diagrams and other statistical metrics.

tools.name: proteingym-base
tools.one_line_profile: Infrastructure for ProteinGym variant effect prediction
tools.detailed_description: The base infrastructure and data classes for the ProteinGym ecosystem, facilitating the combination of assay, sequence, MSA, and structure data for variant effect prediction.

tools.name: proteingym-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking pipeline for ProteinGym
tools.detailed_description: A collection of variant effect prediction models and DVC pipelines to perform benchmarking experiments against ProteinGym datasets.

tools.name: protbench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking suite for protein models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for benchmarking protein model performance on various downstream tasks, developed by Proteinea.

tools.name: ProMIM
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-level interaction modeling for protein mutation prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the ProMIM model for predicting protein mutational effects by modeling multi-level interactions, from Tsinghua University.

tools.name: ProteinWorkshop
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking framework for protein representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking framework for protein representation learning, including pre-training and downstream task datasets, models, and training utilities.

tools.name: VenusFactory
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for protein language model fine-tuning and benchmarking
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit facilitating data acquisition, benchmarking resources, and PLM fine-tuning for biological research.

tools.name: PPIRef
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset and package for 3D protein-protein interactions
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive dataset and Python package designed for working with protein-protein interactions (PPIs) in 3D, facilitating structural biology research and model training.

tools.name: MpbPPI
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-task pre-training approach for predicting mutation effects on PPIs
tools.detailed_description: A multi-task pre-training-based equivariant deep learning approach for predicting the effect of amino acid mutations on protein-protein interactions.

tools.name: ProteinConformers
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for protein conformational landscape diversity
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset designed for simulating and evaluating protein conformational landscape diversity and plausibility, aiding in the study of protein dynamics.

tools.name: cameo
tools.one_line_profile: Computer aided metabolic engineering and optimization tool
tools.detailed_description: A high-level Python library for computer-aided metabolic engineering and optimization, enabling the design of cell factories and analysis of metabolic networks.

tools.name: MotifBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for protein motif-scaffolding problems
tools.detailed_description: A standardized benchmark suite for evaluating protein design algorithms specifically on motif-scaffolding tasks, facilitating comparison of generative models.

tools.name: PXMeter
tools.one_line_profile: Structural quality assessment for protein structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A tool for assessing the structural quality of biomolecular structure prediction models, providing metrics to evaluate prediction accuracy.

tools.name: KiMONo
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-omics network inference tool using PPI priors
tools.detailed_description: A network inference tool for multi-omics datasets that calculates networks using sparse-group-LASSO regression and incorporates prior biological information from protein-protein interactions.

tools.name: ATM_benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark input files for Alchemical Transfer Method
tools.detailed_description: A collection of input files and datasets for benchmarking protein-ligand binding free energy calculations using the Alchemical Transfer Method (ATM).

tools.name: shrec22_proteinLigandBenchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset for SHREC 2022 protein-ligand binding site recognition
tools.detailed_description: Dataset and evaluation tools for the SHREC 2022 contest focused on protein-ligand binding site recognition and molecular surface analysis.

tools.name: priority-viruses
tools.one_line_profile: Variant effect prediction with reliability estimation
tools.detailed_description: A tool and codebase for predicting the effects of viral variants and estimating prediction reliability, focusing on priority viruses.

tools.name: Apobind
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset of Apo structures for protein-ligand complexes
tools.detailed_description: A curated dataset of Apo (unbound) protein structures corresponding to protein-ligand complexes in PDBbind, useful for docking and binding studies.

tools.name: dockstring
tools.one_line_profile: Dataset and benchmark for molecular docking
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for molecular docking with an extensive, highly-curated dataset and a set of realistic benchmark tasks for drug discovery.

tools.name: ATOM3D
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark tasks on molecules in three dimensions
tools.detailed_description: A collection of benchmark datasets and tasks for learning on 3D molecular structures, covering small molecules, proteins, and RNA.

tools.name: Revisiting-PLMs
tools.one_line_profile: Protein language models for function prediction
tools.detailed_description: Implementation exploring evolution-aware and alignment-free protein language models as predictors for protein function.

tools.name: EternaBench
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for RNA structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark for evaluating RNA structure prediction algorithms using diverse thermodynamic prediction tasks and high-throughput datasets.

tools.name: MemCplxDB
tools.one_line_profile: Membrane protein complexes docking benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset specifically designed for the docking of membrane protein complexes.

tools.name: Prot-DNABenchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-DNA docking benchmark
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset for evaluating protein-DNA docking algorithms.

tools.name: binding-affinity-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-protein binding affinity benchmark
tools.detailed_description: Benchmark dataset and scripts for evaluating protein-protein binding affinity predictions.

tools.name: cyclic-peptides
tools.one_line_profile: Cyclic-peptide protein complexes benchmark
tools.detailed_description: Benchmark dataset for cyclic-peptide protein complex docking and associated scripts.

tools.name: LatProtRL
tools.one_line_profile: RL for Protein Fitness Landscapes
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of robust optimization in protein fitness landscapes using reinforcement learning in latent space (ICML 2024).

tools.name: pdb-benchmarks
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking suite for protein structure file parsing and processing
tools.detailed_description: A repository for benchmarking common tasks on protein structures (PDB files) across various programming languages and packages, providing performance metrics for structural biology software development.

tools.name: DeepProtein
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library and benchmark for protein sequence learning
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive deep learning library designed for protein sequence learning tasks, including benchmarks for evaluating model performance on various protein-related prediction tasks.

tools.name: DeepPurpose
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning toolkit for drug discovery and protein function prediction
tools.detailed_description: A Deep Learning Toolkit for Drug-Target Interaction (DTI), Drug Property Prediction, Protein-Protein Interaction (PPI), Drug-Drug Interaction (DDI), and Protein Function Prediction.

tools.name: metalrt/ppi-dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive collection of Protein-Protein Interaction datasets
tools.detailed_description: A repository aggregating multiple standard Protein-Protein Interaction (PPI) datasets including AIMed, BioInfer, HPRD50, IEPA, and LLL, commonly used for benchmarking PPI extraction and prediction models.

tools.name: SeqVec
tools.one_line_profile: Embeddings for protein sequences using ELMo language models
tools.detailed_description: SeqVec (Sequence-to-Vector) applies the ELMo language model concept to protein sequences, generating continuous vector representations (embeddings) for amino acid sequences to capture biophysical properties for downstream prediction tasks.

tools.name: FS-Mol
tools.one_line_profile: Few-Shot Learning Dataset and Benchmark for Molecules
tools.detailed_description: FS-Mol is a dataset and benchmark suite designed to evaluate few-shot learning methods on molecular tasks, containing compounds with activity measurements against various protein targets to drive research in low-data drug discovery regimes.

tools.name: protein-uq
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for uncertainty quantification in protein structure prediction
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking repository for evaluating Uncertainty Quantification (UQ) methods specifically applied to protein structure and function prediction tasks, helping to assess the reliability of AI-generated protein models.

tools.name: rna-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for analyzing RNA sequences, structures, and simulations
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive toolbox for RNA informatics, providing utilities to analyze sequences, secondary and tertiary structures, and simulation data. It is used in RNA CASP and RNA Puzzles challenges.

tools.name: BigBind
tools.one_line_profile: Large-scale protein-ligand binding dataset and benchmark
tools.detailed_description: BigBind provides a massive dataset of protein-ligand binding structures and affinities, accompanied by the BayesBind benchmark, designed to train and evaluate machine learning models for binding affinity prediction and docking.

tools.name: Plantain
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular docking with AI-based pose scoring
tools.detailed_description: Plantain is a molecular docking tool that integrates an AI-driven scoring function to improve the accuracy of ligand pose prediction and binding affinity estimation.

tools.name: PIPR (seq_ppi)
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Protein Interaction Prediction using Siamese Residual RCNN
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of PIPR, a multifaceted Protein-Protein Interaction prediction framework based on Siamese Residual RCNN, utilizing protein sequence information to predict interaction types.

tools.name: Fundus Vessel Segmentation
tools.one_line_profile: Retinal vessel segmentation using CRF and structured SVM
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB-based tool for segmenting blood vessels in retinal fundus images using fully connected conditional random fields (CRF) and structured output SVMs, evaluated on DRIVE and STARE datasets.

tools.name: fishualize
tools.one_line_profile: R package for biologically-inspired color scales and silhouettes
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing color palettes and silhouettes based on fish species for scientific visualization in biology and ecology.

tools.name: PLUMB
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Unified Metrics Benchmark
tools.detailed_description: PLUMB is a curated dataset and benchmark designed to evaluate the performance of force fields and free energy calculation methods in the context of protein-ligand binding.

tools.name: Protein-Ligand Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for free energy calculations
tools.detailed_description: A standardized dataset maintained by the Open Force Field Initiative for benchmarking protein-ligand binding free energy calculations, facilitating the improvement of force fields.

tools.name: ProteinBenchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarks for OpenFF protein force fields
tools.detailed_description: A suite of benchmarks for evaluating the accuracy of Open Force Field protein parameters against experimental data and quantum mechanical calculations.

tools.name: FLOP
tools.one_line_profile: Tasks for Fitness Landscapes Of Protein wildtypes
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark repository defining tasks and datasets for analyzing the fitness landscapes of protein wildtypes, aiding in the evaluation of protein engineering and evolution models.

tools.name: pharmbio/plot_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for plotting Conformal Prediction metrics in Pharma
tools.detailed_description: A utility library from the PharmBio group for visualizing metrics related to conformal prediction, specifically tailored for pharmaceutical and biological data analysis.

tools.name: runs-n-poses
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for protein-ligand co-folding prediction
tools.detailed_description: A benchmark dataset specifically designed for evaluating protein-ligand co-folding prediction models, facilitating the development of algorithms that predict protein structures in the presence of ligands.

tools.name: CASP-and-dataset-performance
tools.one_line_profile: Computer assisted synthesis planning (CASP) analysis tool
tools.detailed_description: Source code and documentation for a Computer Assisted Synthesis Planning (CASP) tool, used for analyzing reaction datasets and evaluating the performance of synthesis planning algorithms.

tools.name: dockECR
tools.one_line_profile: Consensus docking and ranking protocol for virtual screening
tools.detailed_description: An open consensus docking and ranking protocol designed for virtual screening of small molecules, aiming to improve the accuracy of ligand binding predictions by combining multiple docking methods.

tools.name: FLEXS
tools.one_line_profile: Fitness landscape exploration sandbox for biological sequence design
tools.detailed_description: A simulation environment and sandbox for evaluating biological sequence design algorithms on various fitness landscapes, supporting the development of ML-guided protein engineering methods.

tools.name: protein-fep-benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark data for Protein Binding FEP+
tools.detailed_description: A collection of data and scripts associated with the Protein Binding FEP+ benchmark, used to validate and assess the accuracy of Free Energy Perturbation (FEP) calculations in protein-ligand binding.

tools.name: TAPE
tools.one_line_profile: Tasks Assessing Protein Embeddings benchmark suite
tools.detailed_description: TAPE (Tasks Assessing Protein Embeddings) is a comprehensive benchmark suite for evaluating semi-supervised learning models on protein sequences, covering tasks like secondary structure prediction, contact prediction, and fluorescence prediction.

tools.name: TAPE-NeurIPS2019
tools.one_line_profile: NeurIPS 2019 version of TAPE benchmark
tools.detailed_description: The specific version of the TAPE benchmark suite as presented at NeurIPS 2019, providing a standardized set of tasks for assessing protein embeddings.

tools.name: TransMEP
tools.one_line_profile: Transfer learning for Mutation Effect Prediction
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning tool leveraging transfer learning to predict the effects of mutations on protein function and stability, aiding in variant interpretation and protein engineering.

tools.name: LinChemIn
tools.one_line_profile: Linked Chemical Information toolkit for synthesis prediction metrics
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for handling chemical reaction data and calculating metrics on predicted chemical synthetic routes, interfacing with Computer-Aided Synthesis Prediction (CASP) tools.

tools.name: DockQ
tools.one_line_profile: A continuous quality measure for protein-protein docking models
tools.detailed_description: DockQ is a standard quality measure for evaluating protein-protein docking models. It combines three standard metrics (fnat, LRMS, iRMS) into a single score ranging from 0 to 1, reflecting the quality of the predicted structure compared to the native structure.

tools.name: ProMEP
tools.one_line_profile: Zero-shot prediction of mutation effects on protein function
tools.detailed_description: ProMEP is a deep learning tool for predicting the effects of mutations on protein function using multimodal deep representation learning. It enables zero-shot prediction, useful for protein engineering and variant effect interpretation.
